Dear Mr. Fellows:
Thank you for your further letter of March 30th, abopt
your Voice of America programming. Since other publishers
are participating without receiving permission fees, we -w4
glad to grant permission for the William Carlos Williams
poem on the same basis.
We trust that proper credit will be made to the author,
his book, and to New Directions as publisher, where appropriate.
We would appreciate receiving a copy of the USIA study
booklet, or similar printed material, when it is published,
for our files.
With best wishes for the success of your program.
Sincerely yours.
Rhoda Rissin
Permissions Editor
